title: Dubai says drone debris causes fire at Burj Al Arab Hotel
byline: Dubai authorities said debris from an intercepted drone caused a fire at the city’s famed luxury hotel the Burj Al Arab, according to a statement Sunday, following a wave of Iranian strikes launched at Gulf states.

title: Iran confirms supreme leader Khamenei is dead after US, Israeli attacks
byline: Iran’s supreme leader has been killed in Israeli and US strikes, Iranian state media said.

title: Trump claims Iran’s Supreme Leader killed in joint US Israeli strikes, Iran denies reports
byline: Iran’s Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has been killed in a joint American and Israeli strike, according to US president Donald Trump.

title: Dedicated emergency contact numbers introduced for inquiries on Sri Lankans in Middle East
byline: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Foreign Employment and Tourism of Sri Lanka has announced that it is closely monitoring the evolving security situation in the Middle East, emphasizing that the safety and well-being of approximately one million Sri Lankan nationals living and working in the region remain the Government’s highest priority.

title: Mainly fair weather expected to prevail today
byline: Mainly fair weather will prevail over the most parts of the island, today (01), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: Daughter and grandchild of Iran’s Khamenei killed in US-Israeli strikes, state media says
byline: Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei’s daughter, grandchild, daughter-in-law and son-in-law were killed in U.S.-Israeli strikes, Iranian state media reported on Sunday.
